=== About Me ===
I am a software professional from India, working with a multinational company for the past 4 years. I have been using Ubuntu in my personal computer for quite some time. I joined the BeginnersTeam to explore the possibilities open source, contribute to the group and enhance my knowledge in linux. initially I would like to participate in the testing team.
